```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(tidyverse)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("circle", fill = "#e4e4e4", height = "15px"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px"))

wk_post <- tibble(
  

"Data Camp" = c(unchecked,
                checked),

"eCampus" = c(checked,
              unchecked),

"R" = c(checked,
        unchecked),

"Slack" = c(checked,
            unchecked),

"To Do" = c("Check the requirements for the **Final Project**",
            "Complete the <i>optional extra credit</i> data camp module <i>Reporting with R Markdown</i>"),

Location = c("[Link](/tasks/project-tasks/#r-markdown-formatting)",
             "[Link](https://www.datacamp.com/){target='_blank'}")
)
```

<center>
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(wk_post, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'cccclc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(5, width = "15em") %>% 
  row_spec(0, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  row_spec(1, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;')
```
</center>

*Note: These tasks are provided in a recommended order.*
